recipe.title: Red Sauce for Pizza
instructions: Whisk garlic, tomatoes, oil, and salt in a medium bowl. Don’t be tempted to add more salt; the flavor will concentrate when sauce is baked with pizza. Cover and chill 3 hours to let flavors come together before using.
Do Ahead Sauce can be made 1 week ahead. Keep chilled.
